answer:
To clean the print cartridge, follow these steps:
1. Close the scanner.
2. Remove the print cartridge. (Refer to section "3.4 Replacing the Print Cartridge" on page 13).
3. Open the print area.
4. Use a lint-free cloth or rag lightly pressed to wipe off excess ink from the print cartridge holder.
5. Make sure the excess ink is wiped off, then close the print area.
6. Reinstall the print cartridge. (Refer to section "3.4 Replacing the Print Cartridge" on page 13).
